August 2016/ Past Issues

IN THIS ISSUE

Welcome back to ZTEsoft newsletter August Issue.

In this issue, we will present you a sneak peak of the 2nd Annual Smart City InFocus Event in Yinchuan, China this September. Last year’s inaugural event, a collaboration between the City of Yinchuan, ZTEsoft and TM Forum, attracted over 200 senior government and business officials from across the digital smart city ecosystem to network, learn and exchange ideas. This year’s exclusive, invite-only event looks at building sustainable smart cities and offering end-to-end smart services for citizens. Check out the details in COMING EVENT.

IN THE NEWS

Orange Côte d’Ivoire Expands the Partnership with ZTEsoft for Superior BSS Capabilities

Orange Côte d'Ivoire has extended its relationship with ZTEsoft. As part of the agreement, ZTEsoft will upgrade and extend its latest ZSmart 8 OCS (Online Charging System) and ZSmart Policy Manager with Orange Côte d’Ivoire.

Entel Bolivia Selects ZTEsoft to Realize IT Transformation with Full Set of ZSmart B/OSS

Entel Bolivia has selected ZTEsoft to deliver a full set of ZSmart B/OSS solutions that will improve business agility, network operation and maintenance as well as help Entel Bolivia delight its customers with more personalized new services.

ATHKL Deploys ZTEsoft ZSmart cvBS for Unified Customer Experience

Amalgamated Telecom Holdings Kiribati Ltd. (ATHKL) has rolled out its consolidated network by implementing ZTEsoft’s ZSmart cvBS (Convergent Billing System) to consolidate the pre-paid and post-paid customers onto a single system, and unify the charging and billing processes.

ZTEsoft Supports Senegal with Smart Transportation for M-ICT Innovations

ZTEsoft has inked a deal with Senegal to enable the electrical and mechanical system of its expressways. ZTEsoft will work with the project contractor, China International Water & Electric Corporation (CWE) to realize the Smart Transportation in Senegal with M-ICT innovations.

ZTEsoft Supports China Mobile Shanghai for Agile IoT Management

ZTEsoft has signed a contract with China Mobile Shanghai to launch an Internet of Things (IoT) business management platform with ZSmart M2M Enabler. This will help China Mobile Shanghai improve the overall customer experience and service quality.

Yinchuan: A Truly Data-Driven City

Over 1000 senior representatives from governments, service providers, and industry experts from 60+ countries will once again descend on the City of Yinchuan, China for the second annual Smart City InFocus event which will take place from 7-9 September 2016.
